welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bala Cynwyd, a charming town known for its history and scenic views. We're excited to have you here and invite you to explore all that this beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport offers a variety of services for travelers including check-in, baggage claim, and a small cafe.

terminals.name: Private Hangar
terminals.description: The private hangar at Upper Bucks Airport is available for private aircraft storage and maintenance services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport houses all commercial flights and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network throughout the airport.
